author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a race condition in `edm::DeviceProduct<T>` that was identified in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49822#issuecomment-3750219269.

The Metadata object can be shared by multiple data products, so the `DeviceProduct<T>` can't rely on the Metadata destructor to synchronize. Instead, this PR adds a call to a new member function `synchronize()` to `DeviceProduct<T>` destructor before the `T data_` member is destructed (such function necessitates the abstract base class, or some other form of type erasure).

Hopefully resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49822
Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1787

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass.

title: Fix a race condition in `edm::DeviceProduct<T>`
